params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, cnzr), wne(c1, c2), wcel(c0, crg))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ NzRing, c1 ≠ c2, c0 ∈ Ring)
